data.prayer: Lord, please give the 171,833 believers in the county of Taizhou the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Taizhou, Zhejiang, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Taizhou.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 171,833 believers in the county of Taizhou.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Taizhou, Zhejiang, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the She people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Taizhou, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Taizhou, Zhejiang, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Taizhou, Zhejiang, China has a population of 2,265,100.

We estimate Taizhou has 171,833 people who might know Jesus, 36,592 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,056,675 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Taizhou, Zhejiang, China from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
